content: in the into each stitch across do not start in the same stas ch1 single_crochet half_double_crochet 2 double_crochet s double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet 2 double_crochet s half_double_crochet single_crochet turn 11 sts ch1 now go back to working through both loops 2 single_crochet s half_double_crochet 2 double_crochet s 2 double_crochet s double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet 2 double_crochet s 2 double_crochet s half_double_crochet 2 single_crochet s turn 17 sts starting in the next st slstin next 5 sts ch5 slstin 2nd from hook scin next st hdcin next double_crochet in next skip the next2 sts on cat slstin next 2 sts ch5 slstin 2nd from hook scin the next st hdcin the next double_crochet in the next skip the next2 stson cat slstin next slstin last 5 sts fasten_off and weave in end i add buttons for eyes and even some whiskers copyright 2015 upper crust crochet © for french translation please visit https //crochetglobalhypermeganet wordpress com/2016/11/16/le-derriere-de-chat/ if you would like detailed instruction on color-block kitties calico tapestry crochet kitties and tabbies please check out my crochet school s advanced level you will get video tutorials as well as step-by- step detailed patterns that even those newest to crochet can understand click here page 2
